name: Hulu Black Theme (Darker Night Mode)
description: Enable the night mode setting for the theme to work. This theme has much more contrast than the default night mode. Edited version of Hulu Night by learsi. I made the text brighter and more readable, fixed some bugs/unreadable text, and darkened a lot of areas that still had a white background. Some areas are not themed, such as the account settings page.
additional_info: Update 1/11/19: Cleaned up the code a lot. Fixed colors of loading elements, buttons, navbar, etc. Changed the background color to pure black. Made slider button white so its easier to see. Removed borders between content. Changed color of hover popout to match theme better. Lots of other small tweaks.
